scripts.checks: yarn deps:check && turbo run lint format test circular-deps package:checks
scripts.clean-resolve: echo "Use only as a last resort when clean-all fails to resolve an issue. In general yarn.lock should only be modified when dependencies explicitly change." && yarn clean-all && rm yarn.lock && yarn
scripts.test: yarn deps:check && turbo run package:checks circular-deps && turbo run test
scripts.test:all: yarn deps:check && turbo run test test:integration test:integration:ssp
scripts.test:integration: HERMETIC_TEST=true yarn deps:check && turbo run test:integration
scripts.test:integration:ssp: HERMETIC_TEST=true yarn deps:check && turbo run test:integration:ssp
